messages.unsavedChanges: Waxaad leedahay isbeddello aan la kaydiysan

errors.networkError: Khalad shabakad. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
errors.serverError: Khalad server. Fadlan mar dambe isku day.
errors.sessionExpired: Waqtigaaga wuu dhammaaday. Fadlan mar kale gal.

validation.addAtLeastOneItem: Fadlan ku dar ugu yaraan hal shay

validation.invalidJson: Lama keydin karo JSON aan sax ahayn: {{message}}

operations.loadFailed: Soo dejinta {{resource}} ayaa fashilantay. Fadlan bog cusbooneysii.
operations.processFailed: Habaynta {{action}} ayaa fashilantay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
operations.testConnectionFailed: Tijaabinta isku-xirka ayaa fashilantay. Fadlan hubi shabakadaada.

password.changeSuccess: Erayga sirta ah si guul leh ayaa loo beddelay! Fadlan mar kale gal.
password.changeFailed: Beddelida erayga sirta ah ayaa fashilantay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.

confirmations.passwordResetMethod:
Guji OK si aad ugu dirto link-ka dib u dejinta erayga sirta ah iimaylka
Guji Jooji si aad u abuurto oo u muujiso erayga sirta ah ku meel gaar ah

changePassword.title: Bedel Erayga Sirta ah
changePassword.confirmPassword: Xaqiiji erayga sirta ah ee cusub

placeholders.currentPassword: Geli erayga sirta ah ee hadda
placeholders.newPassword: Geli erayga sirta ah ee cusub
placeholders.confirmPassword: Xaqiiji erayga sirta ah ee cusub

requirements.title: Erayga sirta ah waa inuu ka kooban yahay:

validation.currentRequired: Erayga sirta ah ee hadda waa laga dhaadhiciyaa
validation.newRequired: Erayga sirta ah ee cusub waa laga dhaadhiciyaa
validation.notMeetRequirements: Erayga sirta ah ma buuxinayo shuruudaha
validation.confirmRequired: Fadlan xaqiiji erayga sirta ah ee cusub
validation.notMatch: Ereyada sirta ah ma isku mid aha
validation.mustBeDifferent: Erayga sirta ah ee cusub waa inuu ka duwan yahay kan hadda
validation.incorrectCurrent: Erayga sirta ah ee hadda wuu khaldan yahay

changePassword.securityNotice: Ka dib markaad bedesho erayga sirta ah, waa lagaa saari doonaa oo waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad ku soo gasho aqoonsiyadaada cusub.
